summary: The MkDocs AI Hooks project enhances technical documentation and blogs with AI-driven summary generation and intelligent reading statistics using MkDocs hooks. Key features include AI-generated summaries, multi-language support, multiple API services, intelligent content cleaning, efficient caching, and flexible configuration. It also offers smart reading statistics, automatic language recognition, content type detection, cache optimization, and error handling. Installation involves downloading Python files and configuring directories. The tool provides advanced customization options, API integration, error handling, timeout control, and visual optimizations. Future plans include multi-AI service support and automatic selection.
